sentences.sContent: Rotate your team captain – all young soccer players like to be captain for a day.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rotate your team captain – all young soccer players like to be captain for a day.
sentences.sCn: 球队队长轮流制--所有的年轻足球运动员都想有一天能成为队长。

sentences.sContent: But now, my hobbies are sports, like soccer and swimming.
sentences.sContent_eng: But now, my hobbies are sports, like soccer and swimming.
sentences.sCn: 但是现在我的爱好是体育，比如足球和游泳。

phrases.pCn: n. 足球妈妈；非常重视小孩休闲活动，亲自开车接送小孩参加运动，活动的母亲

trans.tranOther: a sport played by two teams of 11 players, who try to kick a round ball into their opponents’  goal
